## AspectContext.getOptions() method

Get custom options passed from the decorator.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOptions(): any;
```
**Returns:**

any

Options object or undefined

## Example


```typescript
// With decorator: @Around(MyAspect, { timeout: 3000 })
const timeout = context.getOptions()?.timeout; // 3000
```
